code: import*as React from'react';import BackHandler from"react-native-web/dist/exports/BackHandler";export default function useBackButton(ref){React.useEffect(function(){var subscription=BackHandler.addEventListener('hardwareBackPress',function(){var navigation=ref.current;if(navigation==null){return false;}if(navigation.canGoBack()){navigation.goBack();return true;}return false;});return function(){return subscription.remove();};},[ref]);}
